extendedInfo.description: Fact or Fiction Lite is a fun and educational game where you choose whether or not a statement is fact or fiction. Expand your knowledge by learning new surprising, interesting, and crazy facts, all while having fun and trying to top your high score in the process!  This is a great game for kids and families.  You will have hours of fun with this game!Features:- Validated facts to ensure they are true- Facts will not repeat until the end of the category- Browse mode to skim though interesting facts- Swipe through facts or use buttons in browse mode- Description field to give more information on a fact- You will encounter puzzling and mind twisting questionsAvailable in Full Version:- Over 500 interesting facts to keep you from being bored at work- Sports, Technology, and TV categories are unlocked- As a bonus, earn a 'Skip' upon getting 5 right in a row- Frequently updated to include more factsWe hope you enjoy the Lite version, please rate and purchase the FULL Version!

reviews.title: AWESOME GAME!!!
reviews.comment: Such a FUN game, and a great way to pass the time!! and so many facts that I thought were true are actually myths! This game is awesome!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool Game
reviews.comment: Very interesting facts and fun to play, bought the full version
reviews.author: A Google User
